name: Sushi Boy
description:
Sushi are falling from the sky! Race to catch them as they drop faster and faster in this fast-paced action arcade game. Updated with 5+ New Upgrades.

• 17 Must Have Games - MacLife.com
• Top 10 Action/Arcade Games for iPad
• 4 Stars from 148apps.com and AppSpy.com

"Sushi Boy squeezes almost every ounce of fun and energy it can out of something as simple as catching sushi falling from the sky, making it a hard game to put down." - AppSpy.com

• Easy to pickup, hard to put down. Short, intense rounds means you can play just a few minutes.
• Tons of unlockables let you upgrade and improve your play
• Hats give you a style upgrade and new powers.
• Pets help you catch sushi just when you need it.
• Arenas let you customize the game further.
• Both Openfeint + Game Center Leaderboards and Achievements
• Universal App runs natively on both your iPhone and iPad
• High Resolution Art for the iPhone 4
